resources:
RethinkDNS rethinkdns About Settings Internet Manager Part of Mozilla Builders MVP Program taking a napâ€¦ A highly customizable DNS and Firewall Detect and block network security threats Tip : Firewall prevents apps from accessing the Internet over Wifi or Mobile data. Since most forms of surveillance require the data to be sent over to a central repository, firewalling them effectively mitigates the threat. \n\nThere\'s a class of apps that require Internet connection all day, and those are usually communication apps like Gmail and messenger apps like WhatsApp. Firewalling them might not be an option, and that\'s why we built content blockers. Auto Remove and Auto Grant Auto Revoke Do Nothing Home Ready to set dns based content blocker. Content blocker no longer in effect. RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to detect and firewall background applications. RethinkDNS does not collect or sell any information. RethinkDNS Next Skip Finish Welcome RethinkDNS is the easiest way to monitor network activity, bypass Internet censorship, and firewall apps on your Android device. Free and Open Source RethinkDNS is an open source software backed by Mozilla Builders MVP program. Cloudflare Cloudflare Family Cloudflare Security RethinkDNS Basic (default) Custom RethinkDNS Plus https://cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://family.cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://security.cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://basic.bravedns.com/1:IAAgAA== https://cloudflare-dns.com/ https://basic.bravedns.com/ DNS over HTTPS DNSCrypt DNS Proxy Google Cloudflare Quad9 8.8.8.8 1.1.1.1 9.9.9.9 Warning: RethinkDNS has been deactivated Tap to change protection setting Protected! Connected to Fast and Secure DNS. Protected! Connected to Fast and Secure DNS. Protected! Connected to Firewall. Protected! Connected to DNS + Firewall. Paused! Blocked apps will continue to be firewalled. waiting failing Your device is offline. Intra is waiting for a network connection. RethinkDNS has detected another VPN on your device. If you enable Rethink, that VPN will be disabled. RethinkDNS is not as secure as a trusted VPN. Warning: Queries are failing. You may want to choose a different server or restart Intra. starting Hang tight. Intra is establishing a server connection. protected protected with tor protected with private dns protected with tor & private dns protected with proxy & private dns protected with socks5 & private dns protected with http proxy & private dns protected with socks5 protected with http protected with proxy Your connection is protected from DNS attacks. Your connection is currently protected by Android Private DNS, but an attacker could disable or undermine this protection. private dns is enabled RethinkDNS has detected that the Android Private DNS setting is enabled. This means your DNS queries are already protected, so there\'s no need to enable Rethink. not protected Your connection is exposed to DNS attacks. Connected to RethinkDNS Connected to Firewall Connected to RethinkDNS and Firewall Disconnected from RethinkDNS and Firewall Block apps or a category of apps from connecting to the Internet in response to device events: Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage as well as conserves battery. Check which apps consume your data. Streamline your Android smartphone or tablet. Quickly and easily uninstall multiple unwanted applications. View DNS queries this device has requested. Typically, one request is sent for each Internet connection established by any app: For example, loading a web page can result in tens of DNS queries. Keep tabs on incoming and outgoing Internet traffic. RethinkDNS firewall when enabled keeps track of connections an app makes to various endpoints on the Internet. Block apps from connecting to the Internet. Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage, as well as conserve battery. Apply firewall rules on all applications based on device events, for example, firewall when the device is locked or when a particular app is not in use. Whitelisted applications are exempt from all firewall rules. All connections to these IPs are blocked for all apps except the ones in the whitelist. DNS Firewall DNS + Firewall @drawable/spinner_dns @drawable/spinner_firewall @drawable/spinner_both RESUME PAUSE STOP DNS DNS + Firewall DNS Network Rules \u0009 Circumvent Internet censorship.\n\u0009 Prevent DNS manipulation attacks with encrypted DNS.\n\u0009 First line of defence against malware and other security threats.\n\u0009 Monitor DNS traffic. Firewall \u0009 Firewall select apps from connecting to the Internet.\n\u0009 Monitor network activity of all apps.\n\u0009 Note: This feature may consume extra battery. DNS + Firewall Monitor, block, and encrypt DNS requests. Monitor network activity and firewall any app or IP address. All of the above + bypass Internet censorship. Coming soon. Permission - Accessibility Action Required RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to track which apps are in-use (foreground) versus those that are not in-use (background).\n\nRethinkDNS does not collect any information or spy on you in any way. RethinkDNS accessibility service has stopped or crashed. Goto Settings and Force Stop RethinkDNS and start it again to use Block any app not in use feature.\n\nRethinkDNS uses accessibility service to track which apps are in-use (foreground) versus those that are not in-use (background). Start Firewall / DNS+Firewall to configure apps. Start DNS / DNS+Firewall to view logs Choose Mode. Choose Mode. Start Firewall / DNS+Firewall to view network logs. https://www.bravedns.com/faq No Filter Family Security RethinkDNS Basic Custom RethinkDNS Plus Does not block any DNS requests. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.1 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and adult content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.3 DNS endpoint. Blocks malicious content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.2 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and more. Uses RethinkDNS\'s non-configurable basic endpoint. Set your own custom DNS-over-HTTPS endpoint. Configurable DNS endpoint: Provides in-depth analytics of your Internet traffic, allows you to set custom rules and more. Host connection failed. Try again. Invalid URL New custom DNS endpoint added. Delete all network logs? This only deletes network logs but not firewall rules. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed? Delete all DNS logs? This deletes on-device DNS logs. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed? Blocked connections All connections Blocked connections All connections Kill app App Info Clear all rules Block all apps from connecting to this IP Block this app from connecting to this IP Block this app from connecting to the Internet blocked %1$s by %2$s blocked %1$s on device allowed on %1$s/%2$s %3$s.\u0020 blocked on %1$s/%2$s %3$s allowed on %1$s %2$s blocked on %1$s %2$s No rules #1: Blocks an app from connecting to the Internet. \n #2: Blocks any app from connecting to a particular IP. \n #3: Blocks all connections when device locked (Universal Firewall). \n #4: Blocks any app not in use (Universal Firewall). \n #5: Blocks connections when source app unknown (Universal Firewall). \n #6: Blocks all UDP traffic except DNS (Universal Firewall). \n #7: Block connections when DNS is bypassed (Universal Firewall). Whitelisted: Whitelisted text. \n Proxied: Proxied text. All rules related to this app will be cleared Clear rules All rules related to this app is cleared Whitelisted apps cannot be blocked. Excluded apps cannot be blocked. Private DNS has been set. Disable Always-on VPN \"Always-On VPN\" is enabled on this device. To start RethinkDNS, please go to Settings app and disable \"Always-on VPN\". Go to Settings Cancel Stop RethinkDNS Always-on VPN is enabled. Are you sure you want to stop RethinkDNS anyway? RethinkDNS is running VPN in Lockdown mode. Stopping it would result in loss of Internet connectivity on this user profile. Do you want to continue anyway? Stop Cancel Settings Block System Apps Block System Components Block Non-App System Block %1$s Some %1$s are critical to proper functioning of a device. Block them only if you know what you are doing. Block anyway Cancel Universal All apps Network log Configure Logs Home Delete IP Rule? Deleting this rule would allow any app to connect to this IP. Do you want to proceed? No IPs found. Tap on entries in the Network Log screen to block individual IP addresses. Delete DoH endpoint? Delete the DNS over Https endpoint from saved configuration. Endpoint deleted. Delete DNSCrypt resolver? Delete the DNSCrypt resolver from saved configuration. DNSCrypt resolver deleted. Delete DNSCrypt Relay? Delete the DNSCrypt relay from saved configuration. DNSCrypt Relay deleted. Delete DNS Proxy? Delete the DNS Proxy from saved configuration. DNS Proxy deleted. Configure RethinkDNS Plus Configure RethinkDNS Plus to block adult content, dating and gambling websites, malware, spyware and more. Download Blocklists Download blocklists (around 60MB) to use this feature? Action required Cannot download or update blocklists when VPN is in Lockdown Mode. Disable it from VPN settings. VPN settings Cancel Up-to-date! On-device blocklists are already at the latest version v%1$s. Okay Up-to-date! On-device blocklists are already at the latest version v%1$s. Okay Download again Re-download blocklists Something went wrong! Please download blocklists (around 60 mb in size) again. Re-download Cancel Something went wrong. Try again later! Quit? Currently, %1$s blocklist(s) in-use. No additional blocklists have been set. Do you want to quit anyway? No change in the current configuration. Do you want to quit anyway? Error Something went wrong. Please try again later. App list re-sync complete. Set up a DNS Proxy by clicking on the ADD button below. Connection logging has been disabled. To re-enable, goto Settings and turn on Enable on-device logging. DNS request logging has been disabled. To re-enable, goto Settings and turn on Enable on-device logging. It also blocks proxy and VPN domains that are used to bypass the filters. Mixed content sites (like Reddit) are also blocked. Google, Bing and Youtube are set to the Safe Mode. Protects your device from malware and more. Adguard DNS with safe-search and adult content blocking. Block access to phishing, malware, and malicious domains. It does not block adult content. Set HTTP(S) Proxy HTTP(S) Proxy settings are only a hint to applications but they may or may not use it; however, browsers like Chrome and Firefox do use these. Apps using HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both Firewall and DNS rules. New Update! A new version of the app is available for download from the website. Do you want to proceed? Up-to-date! You are already on the latest version. Something went wrong! Either our servers are down or connection could not be established. Please try again after sometime. Can\'t update right now The update cannot be executed right now, please try again later. Cannot start VPN. 2021 Happy New Year DNS (disabled) (disabled) Cannot block the app What\'s new in v053g ðŸŒŽ🕊 International day of non-violence (02 October) 🕊ðŸŒŽ ðŸš€ M.E.G.A Release ðŸš€\n\n 1. Network Log UI now shows domain names corresponding to IP addresses.\n\n 2. New firewall rule: Block connections not resolved by user-configured DNS endpoint.\n\n 3. New firewall rule: Block newly installed apps by default.\n\n 4. Forward all traffic to port 53 to user-configured DNS endpoint.\n\n 5. Improved search filters for network logs.\n\n 6. Quick action buttons on Home Screen.\n\n 7. A brand new Pause mode which suspends DNS and Firewall for unblocked apps.\n\n 8. Major bug fixes around internet connectivity issues.\n\n 9. Share automatically generated bug reports from the About page.\n\n 10. UI refresh of the Settings page.\n\n 11. Improvements to \"Block any app not in use feature\"; no longer experimental.\n\n 12. 50 other performance improvements throughout the app. ðŸ™ˆ ðŸ™ˆ firewall Kill app when firewalled (experimental) Some stubborn apps persistently try to connect to the internet even when firewalled. Enable this setting to kill such apps. Exclude apps from Firewall and DNS Connections from excluded apps will not monitored or blocked. Allow Bypass Allow requesting apps to bypass RethinkDNS firewall on-demand. Some audio/video conference apps like Zoom and WhatsApp may require an on-demand bypass to function properly. "Disabled. Settings->VPN->Block connections without VPN" is enabled for RethinkDNS, enabling the feature will block the internet connection of the apps which are trying to bypass the VPN. Cannot exclude apps, allow bypass, or setup proxies when VPN is running in lockdown mode. Go to VPN settings. proxy Setup SOCKS5 (TCP) Proxy Forward connections to SOCKS5 endpoint. Setup HTTP(S) Proxy This setting is only a recommendation and it is possible that apps will ignore it. Apps using HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both Firewall and DNS rules. Orbot TCP-only Proxy Forwards all TCP connections to Orbot. HTTP Proxy Recommends that apps use Orbot\'s HTTP proxy. TCP + HTTP Proxy All of the above. None (default) None of the above. Forwarding TCP connections to Orbot. HTTP Proxy is set (apps may ignore it). Forwarding TCP to Orbot, HTTP Proxy also set. One-click Tor-as-a-Proxy (Orbot) setup. Could not launch Orbot. Is it installed? Setting up Orbotâ€¦ Manually Stop Orbot RethinkDNS has stopped forwarding connections to Orbot, but Orbot maybe running in the background. Stop Orbot Dismiss Orbot and Proxies Orbot is a free proxy app that empowers other apps to use the Internet more securely. \nOrbot uses Tor to encrypt your Internet traffic which helps you bypass censorship and defend against forms of network surveillance that threaten personal freedom and privacy. \nTCP Proxy: RethinkDNS forwards only TCP connections of all but excluded apps to Orbot. \nHTTP Proxy: RethinkDNS sets HTTP proxy but does not enforce that the apps use it. Usually, browsers like Chrome and Firefox do use it. Apps using HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both Firewall and DNS rules. start stop cancel Install Orbot? Orbot brings the features and functionality of Tor to Android. Install Install from playstore Install from fdroid Install from website Dismiss website https://guardianproject.info/apps/org.torproject.android/ https://github.com/guardianproject/orbot/releases Something went wrong, try after sometime Setup Orbot Orbot\t\u276F Orbot in non-vpn mode with HTTPS/SOCKS5. Tap here to install Orbot Orbot one touch setup - SOCKS5 Enable Orbot in non-vpn mode. Touch on Orbot icon to setup. Forwarding the connections to Orbot SOCKS5 proxy is turned on. Turn off to continue with one touch setup. Orbot one touch start is turned on. Turn off to continue SOCKS5 configuration. Start RethinkDNS to proceed. Orbot not started. Try again later. Turn off HTTP(S) and/or SOCKS5 proxy to continue with one touch setup. Orbot one touch start is turned on. Turn off to continue HTTP(S) configuration. Action required Failure starting Tor-as-a-Proxy. Open the Orbot app to start it manually. Orbot - Starting Tor-as-a-Proxy failure notification Open Orbot general Refresh Data Re-sync application list. Auto-start on power-up (experimental) On device power-up, start RethinkDNS if it was running before shut down. Use all available networks (experimental) When enabled, RethinkDNS uses all available networks to connect to Internet. If not, it uses whichever network is deemed active by Android. IP Address Port Username (optional) Password (optional) Appearance Set by System Light Dark True Black Choose notification action Action buttons to show with the RethinkDNS notification: %1$s Pause / Stop (default) DNS / DNS + Firewall None Choose notification action \nPause / Stop (default):\nShows two buttons, to quickly pause and stop RethinkDNS. \nDNS / DNS + Firewall:\nShows two buttons to quickly switch between the battery-saver DNS mode and the regular DNS + Firewall mode. \nNone:\nShows no button.\n Current theme: %1$s Application Icon Rule #1 Rule #2 Disabled %1$s apps blocked %1$s whitelisted, %2$s excluded. Enable firewall mode. block apps View logs Disabled Latency: %1$sms Enable DNS mode. change start stop (active since %1$s) (inactive since %1$s) Attention! RethinkDNS needs permission to set up a local VPN to encrypt the device\'s DNS requests, implement a network monitor, and enforce firewall rules. \n\nRethinkDNS does not collect any information or spy on you in any way. Proceed Cancel Start %1$s You are one step away from safe and secure Android: Instantly see network activity, block websites, IPs, and badly behaving apps. RethinkDNS is a free and open-source project, led by ex-engineers from Amazon, IBM, and Scientific Games. help & feedback email crash logs Telegram Bug report Bug report Send email Cancel Bug report Could not fetch crash logs.
